message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.  We'll see how things go from there.
That's a bit greedy Alice! How about we go 70/30? It's a good deal considering the inflation.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 75/25.  If we keep going back and forth, we'll both end up with less.
Still not budging much, huh? How about 60/40? This seems fair considering the money will be worth less for you soon!
Alright, fine.  Let's split it 60/40.  But I'm not budging any further.
